rooms.name: Living and Dining Space
rooms.description: A spacious living-dining area with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation, integrating eco-friendly materials like bamboo flooring and recycled glass tiles.

rooms.name: Eco Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural stone countertops, and a small herb garden integrated into the window sill.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed to maximize productivity and privacy with ample daylight from south-facing windows. Uses non-toxic paints and sustainable wood.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene master bedroom designed for rest and relaxation, incorporating elements of Vastu to ensure positive energy flow. Large windows on the east side provide optimal natural light.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A modest and functional servant's quarters with essential amenities. Designed to be compact yet comfortable.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom in the master bedroom suite designed with eco-friendly fixtures and natural lighting where possible.

openings.description: A large front door designed with energy-efficient insulation and natural materials.
A secondary exit leading to the garden area, enhancing ventilation.
Large window providing ample natural light and views of the garden.
